From the world, a lot of people at #Ajaccio for our big gathering to follow on http://t.co/EaXM2v7g # FH2012 http://t.co/kncJaxOL
I am here to deliver a rallying message. #Ajaccio
It is the values ​​of the Republic that elevate us. We must drive out this spirit of discord, amalgamation and confusion. #Ajaccio
The Republic is our common ideal. #Ajaccio
The Republic is ensuring everyone's right to security. #Ajaccio
My role will be to give all its place to the School. #Ajaccio
The next President should not be the President of austerity but that of dynamism at the service of our development. #Ajaccio
The time of justice has come: tax justice, social justice, educational justice and territorial justice! #Ajaccio
My duty is to continue the path of progress. #Ajaccio
We will need all the French to make the change. #Ajaccio
France is strong in its differences. It is this diversity that makes France! #Ajaccio
Tomorrow, the day after our victory, I will embark on a new stage of decentralization. #Ajaccio
Decentralization will recognize a regulatory power in each region. #Ajaccio
We will ratify the charter of regional languages. #Ajaccio
We will prepare, with local elected officials, the new development plan for Corsica. #Ajaccio
I denounce the method of promising, announcing, each time with the same words, and unfortunately nothing comes. #Ajaccio
I know how great the disappointments are, how much our citizens can turn away from voting. #Ajaccio
I ask you to spread this message: the policy is not the one that has been conducted for 5 years. #Ajaccio
Politics is to bring acts into conformity with words. #Ajaccio
Politics is not an election campaign that would erase a mandate. #Ajaccio
We will supervise rents where it is necessary to do so. #Ajaccio
We will increase the number of social housing thanks to the doubling of the Livret A ceiling. #Ajaccio
I wish to respond to this call of the youth who wants to succeed, who wants to train. #Ajaccio
I do not accept school dropout. Here, school enrollment rates are among the lowest. We will accompany these young people. #Ajaccio
Corsica is a considerable asset for France. #Ajaccio
Solidarity and specificities do not contradict each other! #Ajaccio
We are 1 month away from the first round. This campaign will be difficult, because the reality is this one. #Ajaccio
Nothing will be spared: caricatures, personal attacks ... But nothing will reach us. #Ajaccio
Nothing will stop us from making the change. #Ajaccio
Together we will achieve victory! #Ajaccio
Let's take the French to the choice of their destiny. Let's share their hope with them. #Ajaccio
The presidential election is always the confrontation between fear and hope. #Ajaccio
The outgoing President will be scary, but the biggest risk would be to continue 5 more years! #Ajaccio
Hope is now! #Ajaccio

A big Patriot and Christian hug for the Heroic Town of Tachira! I will live and we will live! Overcome!
